fullText:

 Watch Jessica Vosk and Kelli Barrett Sing a Song From the Upcoming Broadway Musical Beaches 
 
 
 Broadway performances start on March 27 at the Majestic Theatre.
dtliExcerpt: James Monroe Iglehart brings his considerable charm and vocal prowess to the role of Louis Armstrong, anchoring this biographical musical with warmth and authenticity.
showScoreExcerpt: James Monroe Iglehart brings his considerable charm and vocal prowess to the role of Louis Armstrong, anchoring this biographical musical with warmth and authenticity.
rejectionReasoning: claude: This is a single descriptive sentence that reads like promotional copy or a plot summary with no critical evaluation or recommendation.; openai: The text is a brief mention of a performance without a comprehensive evaluation or recommendation of the show.
